::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod took off, heading for the Cybertronian fire.
"We'll be there in about a hour, hour in a half" He said, to Kamodia.
He suddenly got a idea. He opened his commlink, on all Maximal channels.
"Arcangel, it's Hot Rod. I have found Kamodia, and we are heading back
to the CF." He says, through the commlink.

::DrillBit::

DrillBit heard more shots, outside. He turned to KitKat.
"Do these guys ever quit?" He said. This had been the third major attack
from these guys, in to days.

OOC: Thanks MiniMe, for joining my RPG. If anyone els would like to join
"Neo Transformers Generation One RPG", take this link,
"http://www.egroups.com/group/NTGORPG".
